name: Stephen's Apps (StikDebug & More!)
subtitle: A collection of Stephen B's apps

apps.name: StikDebug
apps.subtitle: On-device debugger
apps.localizedDescription: StikDebug is an on-device debugger designed specifically for self-installed apps.

versions.localizedDescription: Beta iOS 26 support and UI improvements.

apps.name: StikBridge
apps.subtitle: Patreon beta access
apps.localizedDescription: The Patreon beta release of StikBridge is now live! Get early access to new tools and help test features before the full 1.0 release on January 1, 2026. The beta will continue to receive experimental builds and updates even after the public 1.0 release, remaining a dedicated testing branch for new features.

versions.localizedDescription: Patreon beta release of StikBridge — now live! Exclusive early access for Patreon supporters to test new features and tools before the public 1.0 release. The beta will continue to exist as an ongoing test branch with new experimental features even after 1.0 launches.

apps.name: StikDoodle Pro
apps.subtitle: Patreon beta — Simple drawing app
apps.localizedDescription: StikDoodle Pro is a no-frills drawing app. Sketch and note on a clean canvas with basic pen and eraser tools, a color picker, and an optional grid. Save, share, and draw with ease, all in dark mode-friendly vibes, running locally on your device.

versions.localizedDescription: Patreon beta release of StikDoodle Pro — simple sketching and note-taking.
